channel.title: 2h issue
channel.description:
Hello, I don't know if this should be client or server sided, so I'm sorry if I'm in the wrong section. I just added a 2handed custom to my server. I've added it into the statement that I use for all my godswords. And the attack emote, etc. works, but the sword is still in the position as if it was a 1hander. I've never had to work with this issue because I've never encountered it, help will be appreciated.
[IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/2quq3dh.jpg[/img]

item.title: 2h issue
item.dc:creator: @WhyPlayLegit WhyPlayLegit
